_comment_username: Your factorio username. Used to retrieve updates
_comment_token: The token for your username, used for authentication instead of password
_comment_serverdir: The directory where your headless servers are
_comment_startport: We are looking for open ports to bind to starting with this one
_comment_whitelist: The server whitelist used. Contains a list of strings. Create whitelist file if none is found
_comment_bindip: Ip v4 to bind to. Defaults to 0.0.0.0
